title: [Large-scale] Generative AI Collaborative Creative Learning Curriculum for Postdigital Architectural Education

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental architectural concepts, experience with digital tools, and elementary understanding of scientific principles
context.additional_context: Science-integrated architectural education conducted as part of corporate technical training programs. Collaborative learning environments utilizing generative AI in BYOD settings

learning_goals: Learners can decompose and explain post-digital architectural design processes into three or more stages using generative AI
Learners can collaborate with AI to create one or more architectural prototypes and implement designs integrating physical/digital elements
Learners can identify and discuss three or more ethical issues (e.g., copyright, infringement of creativity) that may arise when using generative AI
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
